statements: UPDATE regulatory_compliance_data SET compliance_status='Updated' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE regulatory_compliance_data SET risk_level='Low' WHERE company_name='ABC Inc';
UPDATE regulatory_compliance_data SET compliance_status = 'Compliant', risk_level = 'Low' WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp'
UPDATE regulatory_compliance_data SET risk_level = 'Medium', compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant', regulation_name = 'Regulation XYZ' WHERE id = 5
UPDATE regulatory_compliance_data SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE id = '1f9a4522-cd58-4ed5-afec-94bbe61976ca';
UPDATE risk_monitoring_data SET risks_detected = FALSE, risk_description = 'No significant risks detected' WHERE company_id = 'e4fc44ce-7d91-46e7-94c4-3b7b3591e117';
UPDATE regulatory_compliance_data SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE id = 'db97e218-b7da-4886-8f25-605cbf3b0c68';
UPDATE risk_monitoring_data SET risks_detected = FALSE, risk_description = 'No risks identified' WHERE company_id = '0d2c0fd8-96f8-4d8c-a617-9750687515e8';
UPDATE compliance_data SET risk_level = 3, report_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE monitoring_records SET compliance_status = 'Compliant', record_date = '2022-01-20' WHERE record_id = 5;
UPDATE compliance_data SET risk_level = 2, report_date = '2022-02-28' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE monitoring_records SET compliance_status = 'Non-Compliant', record_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE compliance_id = 3 AND regulation_id = 2;
UPDATE RegulatoryEntity SET entity_name = 'Regulatory Authority' WHERE entity_id = 1;
UPDATE ComplianceReports SET report_content = 'Quarterly Report Updated' WHERE report_id = 3;
UPDATE RegulatoryEntity SET entity_name = 'Updated Entity 1' WHERE entity_id = 10;
UPDATE ComplianceReports SET report_content = 'Updated Report Content' WHERE entity_id = 15 AND report_date = '2022-08-15';
UPDATE regulatory_agencies SET agency_name = 'Updated Agency 1' WHERE agency_id = 1;
UPDATE regulations SET regulation_description = 'Updated Regulation Description 2' WHERE regulation_id = 2;
UPDATE regulatory_agencies SET agency_name = 'New Agency Name', agency_description = 'Updated agency description' WHERE agency_id = 1;
UPDATE compliance_measures SET measure_description = 'Updated measure description', measure_name = 'New Measure Name' WHERE measure_id = 3;
